attributes.action: ask the Queen to dissolve parliament and call a General Election,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The expenses scandal has completely obliterated the general public's belief in the integrity of our MPs. A great way to repair this breach of trust would be to dissolve parliament and bring in fresh untainted politicians to serve us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
